mapper.insert: insert into t_api_doc ( create_date, modify_date, proj_id, title, description, host, base_path, version, pub, open, scheme, consume, produce ) values ( #{createDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{projId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{host}, #{basePath}, #{version}, #{pub}, #{open}, #{scheme}, #{consume}, #{produce} )
mapper.select: select count(d.id) from t_api_doc d inner join t_proj p on d.proj_id = p.id inner join t_proj_mem m on p.id = m.proj_id where d.id = #{docId} and m.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.sql:
from t_proj_mem pm inner join t_proj p on pm.proj_id = p.id inner join t_api_doc d on p.id = d.proj_id where pm.user_id = #{userId} and d.pub = 1
and d.title = #{title}
mapper.select:
select p.id as proj_id, p.code, p.name, d.id as doc_id, d.title, d.create_date, d.version
order by d.create_date desc,p.code asc limit #{pager.start},#{pager.pageSize}
